thread.title: Andre Ayew rediscovers scoring boots as he scores a header in Swansea's 2-2 draw with Tottenham
thread.title_full: Andre Ayew rediscovers scoring boots as he scores a header in Swansea's 2-2 draw with Tottenham

title: Andre Ayew rediscovers scoring boots as he scores a header in Swansea's 2-2 draw with Tottenham
text:
19:40 CET Andre Ayew rediscovers scoring boots as he scores a header in Swansea's 2-2 draw with Tottenham - www.ghanasoccernet.com Andre Ayew heading home his fourth goal of the season 
Ghana international winger Andre Ayew rediscovered his scoring form as he scored from a header for Swansea City in their 2-2 draw with Tottenham Hotspur in the English Premier League on Sunday. 
The 25-year-old hanged high in the air to beat the Spurs defense and head home the opening goal for the Welsh side in the 16th minute at the Liberty Stadium. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Undoubtedly war is an act of destruction at large & cannot be put on a certain allowance. By: Dr. Amrit Gaur
